title: 256: Just Because You're Pooping Doesn't Mean You're Out of Harm's Way
itunes:title: Just Because You're Pooping Doesn't Mean You're Out of Harm's Way
description: Former Green Beret and CEO of Black Rifle Coffee Company Evan Hafer talks combat, coffee, and what it’s like to take a blast of bear spray in the face… on purpose.
itunes:author: The Way I Heard It with Mike Rowe
dc:creator: The Way I Heard It with Mike Rowe
